mapper.sql: resource_id, resource_name, resource_code, resource_url, resource_desc, css_cls, order_no, parent_id, resource_type, active, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_b_resources where active = 1 order by order_no asc

select a.resource_id, a.resource_name, a.resource_code, a.resource_url, a.resource_desc, a.css_cls,a.active, a.create_time, a.update_time,a.order_no, a.parent_id, a.resource_type from t_b_resources a inner join t_b_user_resource b on a.resource_id = b.resource_id where a.active = 1 and b.active = 1 and b.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by order_no asc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_b_resources
resource_id,
resource_name,
resource_code,
resource_url,
resource_desc,
css_cls,
order_no,
parent_id,
resource_type,
active,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update t_b_resources
resource_name = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resource_code = #{resourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resource_url = #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resource_desc = #{resourceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
css_cls = #{cssCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
resource_type = #{resourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
active = #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_b_resources set resource_name = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resource_code = #{resourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resource_url = #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resource_desc = #{resourceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, css_cls = #{cssCls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, resource_type = #{resourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, active = #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
